data.text: @mmfa Of course the "we've neglected to mention" list at Fox is now overwhelmed by aggressive failing-to-mention their complicity in past blackmail of Zelensky and Ukraine
@mmfa So much for the "emergency powers will never be rescinded" crowd

@mmfa Of course Fox didn't mention that Trudeau revoked them.  That would assume that Fox News was a real news organization and not a vermin-ridded Trumpian propaganda machine for Republicans who love anything Trumpie loves including Putin. https://t.co/dbDul7Al9p
